data.what_is: Netrefer's Unified Performance Marketing Platform is an automated marketing solution built for the affiliate life cycle.
data.product_description: Netrefer's Unified Performance Marketing Platform is an automated marketing solution built for the affiliate life cycle.

initial_reviews.review_title: If you are in Gaming affiliates and in Europe, this solution might be an opcion.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Netrefer Performance Marketing Platform?
What I like the best about Netrefer is the level of specialization in gaming affiliates. There are not many companies that manage all the particular features of this workflow.

What do you dislike about Netrefer Performance Marketing Platform?
I dislike the UX flow is not to current standards, many times the incumbents tend to get stuck in time with minor details that eventually become technical debt.

Recommendations to others considering Netrefer Performance Marketing Platform:
Consider checking your particular niche if you are looking to monitor your affiliate campaigns. More than the technology in itself (which is becoming commoditized) look for solutions with strong network effects, otherwise, you carry with the "network debt" of any given solution.

What problems is Netrefer Performance Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
If you are looking to keep track of your affiliate life cycle, Netrefer can cover this need. The benefits are full visualization of media insertion, pixel tracking on landing pages, and other features.
